code: import React,{useState}from'react';import profileImage from'../../assets/images/profile/profile.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Profile(){const[profile,setProfile]=useState({name:'Miguel',email:'miguel@example.com',bio:'Developer based in Spain, passionate about technology and innovation.'});const handleChange=e=>{setProfile({...profile,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();console.log('Profile Updated:',profile);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Profile Page"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:profileImage,alt:"Profile",className:"profileImage"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"profile-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormInput,{label:"Name",name:"name",value:profile.name,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormInput,{label:"Email",type:"email",name:"email",value:profile.email,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FormInput,{label:"Bio",type:"textarea",name:"bio",value:profile.bio,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Save Changes"})]})]});}function FormInput(_ref){let{label,type='text',name,value,onChange}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[label,":"]}),type==='textarea'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:name,value:value,onChange:onChange}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:type,name:name,value:value,onChange:onChange})]});}export default Profile;
